longBusinessSummary: HCB Financial Corp. operates as the bank holding company for Highpoint Community Bank that provides various banking products and services in Michigan. The company offers various personal banking services, including checking and savings accounts; mortgage, home equity, and personal loans. It also provides business banking services, including business checking and savings accounts; business loan services, such as real estate lending, lines of credit, and term loans; small business administration loans; other services that consists of sweep and courier banking services, merchant credit card services, night depository and wire services, health savings accounts, and business mentoring; and digital services. In addition, the company offers overdraft services; mobile, telephone, military, and online banking services; business remote deposit capture, mobile wallet, mobile deposit, eStatements, and bill pay services; and debit, credit, gift, and reloadable cards. Further, it provides wealth management services, including investment services; and trust services, such as personal trust, estate settlement, individual retirement account, and corporate retirement plan services. Additionally, the company offers insurance products, annuities, bonds, mutual funds, and stocks. HCB Financial Corp. was founded in 1886 and is headquartered in Hastings, Michigan.
